channel.title: Argh! exception!
channel.description:
i had it all fine until now, it says
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1279) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) Press any key to continue . . .
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 12:45:27 PM[/size][hr]please help....

item.title: Argh! exception!

@dark24 wrote:

like it says java:1279[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 12:53:37 PM[/size][hr]nvm fixed it
